                                        String filesPath,
                                        URI baseUri)
                                 throws org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.exceptions.RegistryException
        Return an Entry representing file/folder metadata for a resource
        Parameters:
        resource - The file/folder resource
        filesPath - The base path for files
        baseUri - The request base URI
        Returns:
        The entry bean representing the file/folder
        Throws:

      • treeWalk

        public static Entry treeWalk(String filesPath,

                             URI baseUri,
                             boolean recursive)
                      throws org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.exceptions.RegistryException
        Construct metadata for a hierarchical file/folder tree
        Parameters:
        filesPath - The path to the file space
        path - The root path to start at
        registry - The registry instance
        baseUri - The request base URI
        recursive - True to recurse into subdirectories, False otherwise
        Returns:
        The hierarchical metadata
        Throws:
        org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.exceptions.RegistryException - Thrown if an error occurs when accessing the registry

      • treeWalk

        public static Entry treeWalk(String filesPath,
                             String path,
                             Pattern fileNamePattern,
                             Pattern mediaTypePattern,
                             org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.session.UserRegistry registry,
                             URI baseUri,
                             boolean recursive)
                      throws org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.exceptions.RegistryException
        Construct metadata for a hierarchical file/folder tree
        Parameters:
        filesPath - The path to the file space
        path - The root path to start at
        fileNamePattern - Only include entries whose file name matches this regexp
        mediaTypePattern - Only include entries whose media type matches this regexp
        registry - The registry instance
        baseUri - The request base URI
        recursive - True to recurse into subdirectories, False otherwise
        Returns:
        The hierarchical metadata
        Throws:
        org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.exceptions.RegistryException - Thrown if an error occurs when accessing the registry

      • filterMatches

                                    Pattern fileNamePattern,
                                    Pattern mediaTypePattern)
        Check whether an entry matches the given filters
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry metadata
        fileNamePattern - The file name regexp
        mediaTypePattern - The media type regexp
        Returns:
        True if the entry matches, False otherwise

      • filterMatches

        public static boolean filterMatches(String fileName,
                                    String mediaType,
                                    Pattern fileNamePattern,
                                    Pattern mediaTypePattern)
        Check whether the given fileName and mediaType match the given filters
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name
        mediaType - The file media type
        fileNamePattern - The file name regexp
        mediaTypePattern - The media type regexp
        Returns:
        True if match successful, False otherwise
